message.body: Sent over flowers. A thank you for everything. Hope I didn't offend.

Oh Azeem that's very nice thank you. I haven't been home yet but I'm looking forward to receiving them. However, I do not have any romantic feelings for you and will not accept the flowers as anything but a gesture of kindness between friends.
Of course, as a friendly gesture

Must be a cultural thing. Back home sending red flowers means romantic inclination, sending flowers of mixed colors (as I sent ) means 'I hope you feelbetter' which are sent for people who are unwell or unhappy.
Oh I don't know. I haven't seen the flowers yet Azeem. It's all well. I'm actually having a really stressful day so I'm looking forward to seeing them. Things with fm have gone completely sour.
Anyway, was I unwell?
If so how'd you know?
.... numbers
.....thats how I attend these epic conferences and get close to academic superstars. I see patterns and I act on it
Pattern recognition. ... happens automatically
I hope you haven't eaten too much chocolate for vday!
Azeem what unwellness is this? Why didn't you tell me earlier?
No not at all. Met my student from University back home, had some pizza with him . ..... didnt want to make you alll anxious n everything
Think happy thoughts
Azeem I'm really curious about what specifically you saw in the numbers. Bc I have had a few things go "different kinds of" wrong
Like with fm today. Superficial but serious. And then I had the flu so I was really sick. Also John and Gabi giving me shit has been really hurtful
I said before..... think happy thoughts or the flu will get worse.....
If you want to unload and talk.. talk to some one... dont keep it inside
You know you mean well. Be diplomatic. Let saul do his thing. Dont take over. Ask fish for advice... he is level headed. Dont talk to saul for a few days
Dont push anyone. Just send a friendly group email reminder about deadlines next week on monday
Go home and rest. Email from your couch
Saul has fucked us over and there's no time.
Listen, I'm nice but people fuck with me and act cowardly and leave me to clean up their mess ... No way.
Stop talking to john... take over then.... keep fish in the loop
Not when I'm in grad school hell no
Fuck John. I'm over John
Other shit has gone down
I know...
Can brian help or advise in this....
The professors need to get Involved
I agree
It's just that he is acting selfishly and immature
I care about Saul deeply. I don't think he's a bad person
Think positive and happy thoughts. I haven't seen the flowers but I chose them online since they were colorful.
Talk to jan and take brians advice too
Email them... dont email details just say you want to talk for few mins.. ask fish if he can come too...
Who is
Saul
Look. People have good and bad times. We both know most people cant handle sofie's intensity
You are working towards something ambitious. Be minimalistic. Less is more, sofie
Most stuff will be like hitting an egg from a moving car .... go with the flow... Count the facts and build on them. Bring fish into it.. he is a curato too.. talk to jan or brian together
Walk outside. Have a cigarette. Breathe the winter air
I believe in you
And regarding saul... 5 months in not a long time to know someone that well.... people are not always what they appear
I.e. dont try to hold onto something thats not there
